description.ko: 디지털 영역 내 식물 진화에 대한 선구적인 시각을 제시합니다. FLORA-9은 유기적인 아름다움과 알고리즘의 복잡성이 결합된 데이터 기반 유기체로 번성합니다.
description.en: A visionary look into the evolution of botany within a digital realm, where FLORA-9 thrives as a data-driven organism blending organic beauty with algorithmic complexity.

prompt: Cinematic close-up of FLORA-9, a futuristic digital plant with translucent crystalline leaves and glowing neon fiber-optic veins. The petals are composed of shifting geometric voxels that pulse with cyan and violet light. Floating data particles drift around the stem like pollen. Set in a dark, ethereal virtual greenhouse, hyper-realistic, 8k resolution, ray-tracing reflections, Unreal Engine 5 aesthetic.
